snippet: The move, announced by Defense Secretary Ashton B. Carter, puts the Americans closer to the Iraqi soldiers involved in combat, allowing for timely guidance.
abstract: Defense Dept officials announce that United States will send military advisers closer to front lines of conflict against Islamic State in Iraq.
lead_paragraph: The move, announced by Defense Secretary Ashton B. Carter, puts the Americans closer to the Iraqi soldiers involved in combat, allowing for timely guidance.

headline.main: U.S. to Send Military Advisers Closer to Front Lines of ISIS Fight in Iraq
headline.print_headline: U.S. Will Send Military Advisers Closer to Front Lines of ISIS Fight in Iraq
